title: Mac-On-Stick
description:
This is the Mac-On-Stick.  It runs Mac System Software version 7.0.1.

To install: drag Install 1.image onto the Mini vMac app and click OK when the message comes up.  Now drag the hfs24M.dsk file into Mini vMac.  Click install.  Drag each disk from the Mac-On-Stick folder into Mini vMac as it asks for them.  It may take a few minutes for it to start installing.  Just be patient.  Once installed, click quit.  Press restart.  Now, you have two options.  Either drag the hfs24M.dsk file into Mini vMac or hit control-o and navigate to the disk image.  To shut Mini vMac down, click Special, and then Shut Down.  When it says it is safe to turn the mac off, hit control-q.  To start Mini vMac after the install is done, you have 3 options.  With Mini vMac not running, drag the hfs24M.dsk file onto the Mini vMac app.  It will start Mini vMac and load Mac.  Or, with Mini vMac running, drag the hfs24M.dsk file into the Mini vMac window, or hit control-o and find the hfs24M.dsk file.

Enjoy!
